```js
panControl: true,
scaleControl: false,
zoomControl: true,
mapTypeControl: false,
overviewMapControl: true
```

```js
mapTypeControl: true,
mapTypeControlOptions: {
  mapTypeIds: [google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP, google.maps.MapTypeId.HYBRID],
  style: google.maps.MapTypeControlStyle.DROPDOWN_MENU
}
```
